# Explore projects

In this section you explore __tercen__ public projects. Doing so will copy the uploaded data and workflow. 

* Click on `Explore`

<center><img src="images/explore.png"></center>


* Scroll down to `tercen/tutorialproject`
* Click on `tercen/tutorialproject`

You can now see the chosen project and its files.

* The icon for cloning is shown in the top right

<center><img src="images/clone.png"></center>

* Click on the cloning icon

A popup will show, giving you the option to clone to any team you're in.

<center><img src="images/what_team.png"></center>

* Click `Ok`

You are now in your personal team with a clone of the tutorialproject. 

<center><img src="images/team.png"></center>

In the next section we learn how to  clone a public project.
